metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2624 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap buffer overflow in PDF in Google Chrome prior to 104.0.5112.79 alloweda remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific userinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
